text: Bjørn Guldvog (born 16 June 1958) is a Norwegian physician and civil servant. He took the cand.med. and later the dr.med. degree, and was a researcher at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health from 1989 to 1992. He was then head of department at from 1993 to 2001, head of department in the Norwegian Directorate for Health and Social Affairs from 2002, then assisting director from 2004 and director from 2012. The directorate changed its name to the Norwegian Directorate for Health in 2008. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian physicians Category:Directors of government agencies of Norway
title: Bjørn Guldvog
